```{r}
gym <- read_csv("D:/Downloads/Generate synthetic_phq9_dataset.csv")
```


```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(gtsummary)

# Optional: specify the order of PHQ response categories
phq_levels <- c("Not at all", "Several days", "More than half the days", "Nearly every day")

# Convert PHQ items to ordered factors
gym_ordered <- gym %>%
  mutate(across(
    starts_with("PHQ"), 
    ~ factor(.x, levels = phq_levels, ordered = TRUE)
  ))

# Create summary table
tbl <- gym_ordered %>%
  tbl_summary(
    missing = "no",                                # exclude missing values
    statistic = all_categorical() ~ "{n} ({p}%)"   # counts and percentages
  )

# Print the table
tbl

```
